data.message: Seems like there are responses from Facebook to everyone's problems but mine, could someone please help me get the issues resolved.  Please don't refer me to the help page as every time I change a screen in my account I have to change the www to beta just to be able to see anything and sometimes that doesn't even work.  THIS IS MY FOURTH REQUEST FOR HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.message: We are here for you, Cheryl. This sounds like a web browser issue. Test this by trying to log into Facebook from another browser. You can learn which browsers we recommend here: http://on.fb.me/1eNexLp.  We hope this helps! -Kevin
